attributes.action: Investigate the possibilities of the Installation of a Traffic Camera upon South Road Norton, Stockton on Tees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE would like to partition the Prime Minister to investigate with the Local Government and Police force about the possibility of installing a Gatso Camera upon South Road. Norton Stockton on Tees. 
This road is and has been for a number of years used by motorists as a speed track with numerous near misses and accidents being seen.  It is a main school access road and is frequented by both Children and Mums going to / from the school and shops.
Regardless of this vehicles storm down this road as though it was a race track.
It needs to be STOPPED ...Please.
